channel.title: Hugo on My-Self
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on My-Self

item.title: My First Hugo site
item.description: HUGO Getting started with my Hugo site was a bit of a journey. At first, I had no idea where to begin, but I was determined to figure it out. I faced many difficulties along the way, from understanding the basics of Hugo to grappling with the complexities of web development. There were moments when I felt frustrated and overwhelmed, but I kept pushing forward. With patience and perseverance, I slowly started to piece things together.
